mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID ,A.LOGIN_ID ,A.DEPT_CODE ,A.USER_NM ,(SELECT PKG_CRYPTO.DECRYPT(A.PASSWORD) FROM DUAL) AS PASSWORD ,A.MOBLPHON ,A.EMAIL ,A.CLSF_CODE ,A.OFCPS_CODE ,A.AUTHOR_SE_CODE ,CASE WHEN A.AUTHOR_SE_CODE = 'SY09000004' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS AUDIT_AT ,( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(IB.AUTHOR_NM) > 1 THEN '[' || REGEXP_REPLACE(LISTAGG(IB.AUTHOR_NM,', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY IB.AUTHOR_NM),'([^,]+)(, \1)+','\1') || ']' ELSE LISTAGG(IB.AUTHOR_NM,', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY IB.AUTHOR_NM) END FROM SY_AUTHOR_USER IA INNER JOIN SY_AUTHOR IB ON IA.AUTHOR_CODE = IB.AUTHOR_CODE WHERE IA.USER_ID = A.USER_ID GROUP BY IA.USER_ID ) AS AUTHOR_SE_CODE_NM ,A.RESIGNDTE ,A.LOCK_AT ,A.LOCK_RESN ,A.USE_AT ,A.SIGN_ATCHMNFL_SEQNO ,A.LAST_CHANGER_ID ,A.LAST_CHANGE_DT ,A.PASSWORD_FAILR_CO ,B.BEST_INSPCT_INSTT_CODE ,B.INSPCT_INSTT_NM ,A.DEPT_CODE ,A.BPLC_CODE ,A.SBSCRB_CONFM_AT FROM SY_USER A LEFT JOIN SY_INSPCT_INSTT B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.INSPCT_INSTT_CODE WHERE A.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId} AND A.USE_AT = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE AT_LOGIN_HIST SET LOGOUT_DT = SYSDATE , LAST_CHANGER_ID = #{userId} , LAST_CHANGE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE LOGIN_DT = (SELECT MAX(LOGIN_DT) FROM AT_LOGIN_HIST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp})

SELECT PASSWORD_FAILR_CO AS passwordFailrCo FROM SY_USER WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND LOCK_AT = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE SY_USER SET PASSWORD_FAILR_CO = NVL(PASSWORD_FAILR_CO,0) + 1 WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' AND LOCK_AT = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SY_AUTHOR_MENU A LEFT JOIN SY_AUTHOR_USER B ON A.AUTHOR_CODE = B.AUTHOR_CODE LEFT JOIN SY_MENU C ON A.MENU_SEQNO = C.MENU_SEQNO WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.MENU_URL = #{menuUrl} AND C.USE_AT = 'Y'
